content.question: Pliny’s description of his uncle’s actions in this passage imply that his uncle

choices.label: respected the bravery of those around him
was setting an example of courage for others
believed the farmers were justified in their fear
was trying to calm his own fear through rest

content.answer: was setting an example of courage for others

unit.text: 2: Pliny's Letters: Eruption of Mt. Vesuvius
